SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.product_image_no, i.product_image_path, i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name, i.prodcut_image_file_real_name, i.product_image_product_no, i.product_thumbnail FROM duck_user d INNER JOIN favorite f ON f.favorite_user_no = #{userNo} INNER JOIN category c ON f.favorite_category_no = c.category_no INNER JOIN product p ON c.category_no = p.product_category_no INNER JOIN product_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_image_product_no WHERE i.product_thumbnail = 1 ) tbl ) b
WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 9

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT i.product_image_no, i.product_image_path, i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name, i.prodcut_image_file_real_name, i.product_image_product_no, i.product_thumbnail, b.board_views FROM board b INNER JOIN category c ON b.board_category_no = c.category_no INNER JOIN product p ON c.category_no = p.product_category_no INNER JOIN product_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_image_product_no WHERE i.product_thumbnail = 1 ORDER BY b.board_views DESC ) tbl ) b WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 9
